lead_paragraph: RICKMAN--Alan. Brooklyn Academy of Music (BAM) mourns the passing of Alan Rickman, an exceptional talent and great friend to the institution as an actor, director, advocate, and audience member. Alan was part of our artistic family, directing "Creditors" in 2010, directing and performing in "John Gabriel Borkman" in 2011, graciously serving as co-emcee at a gala for our departing president, and participating in numerous BAMcinematek and humanities programs. BAM was graced by Alan's creative passion, consummate professionalism and kindness, and we extend our heartfelt condolences to his wife Rima and family at this time. BAM President Katy Clark, BAM Executive Producer Joseph V. Melillo, BAM President Emerita Karen Brooks Hopkins, BAM board and staff 1/3
